LanguageData.GTEar.label: Cybernetic Bionic Ear
LanguageData.GTEar.description: The advanced version of the bionic ear. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces.
LanguageData.ArchotechEye.label: Cybernetic Bionic Eye
LanguageData.ArchotechEye.description: The advanced version of the bionic eye. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces.
LanguageData.ArchotechArm.label: Cybernetic Bionic Arm
LanguageData.ArchotechArm.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Gives the owner incredible strength. You may destroy your opponents limbs in a fist fight...not recomended for wardens.
LanguageData.ArchotechLeg.label: Cybernetic Bionic Leg
LanguageData.ArchotechLeg.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Give the owner incredible speed
LanguageData.GTHeart.label: Cybernetic Heart
LanguageData.GTHeart.description: A powerful cardiac augmentation, replacing standard human hearts. Safely manages very high blood flow without overwhelming standard body parts.
LanguageData.GTLung.label: Cybernetic Lung
LanguageData.GTLung.description: A powerful vascular augmentation, replacing standard human lungs. The perfect pairing with a cybernetic heart, this increases circulatory speed, increasing efficiency.
LanguageData.GTKidney.label: Cybernetic Kidney
LanguageData.GTKidney.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human kidneys. Increasing blood filtration efficiency.
LanguageData.GTLiver.label: Cybernetic Liver
LanguageData.GTLiver.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human livers. Increasing blood filtration efficiency and metabolic efficiency.
LanguageData.GTstomach.label: Cybernetic Stomach
LanguageData.GTstomach.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human stomachs. Increasing digestion efficiency and metabolic efficiency.
LanguageData.GTHand.label: Cybernetic Bionic Hand
LanguageData.GTHand.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of arm upgrades, just replacing hands.
LanguageData.GTFoot.label: Cybernetic Bionic Foot
LanguageData.GTFoot.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of leg upgrades, just replacing feet.
LanguageData.GTDentures.label: Cybernetic Bionic Jaw
LanguageData.GTDentures.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano machinery to break down food instantly with minimal effort.
LanguageData.GTSpine.label: Cybernetic Bionic Spine
LanguageData.GTSpine.description: The most crucial part of the human body improved with the best available nano materials. Greatly imroved manipulation and movement.
